name: Jurassic Rampage: Smash the City!
description:
Let loose a frenzy of prehistoric destruction and fight off an entire army with Jurassic Rampage! Stomp, smash, and bite a fully destructible town to pieces! Unleash a ferocious roar to send your enemies flying, use your powerful jaws to crumble entire buildings, and stomp soldiers into the ground with your massive Tyrannosaurus Rex!

Download Jurassic Rampage today while it's 50% OFF for a very limited time!

Game Features
+ T. REX RAMPAGE - Use your entire arsenal of weapons to smash the city to bits and earn points!
+ BATTLE AN ARMY - Fight off soldiers, tanks, and attack helicopters that will come to the rescue of their beloved city!
+ LEVEL-UP AND GROW - Grow into a massive monster, destroy towering sky scrapers, and squish dozens of civilians and soldiers with a single step!
+ TWO GAME MODES - Smash for as long as you can in Survival Mode or challenge yourself with an invincible free-for-all in a 2-minute Time Attack!
+ FULLY DESTRUCTIBLE 3D TOWN - Your T. Rex is free to unleash it's rage on every last brick of this unsuspecting town!
+ HD GRAPHICS - Stunning High Definition graphics will have you cowering in fear of your own T. Rex!
+ GLUTEN-FREE PROMISE - With all of our games you will always get the full game with no ads or additional purchases!

Download Jurassic Rampage and unleash your very own Tyrannosaurus Rex on an epic frenzy of carnage!

Be sure to check out our awesome Virtual Pets! Howl at the moon with the Virtual Pet Wolf or burn villages to the ground with the Virtual Pet Dragon!
